description: This script ensures the presence of a local 'sass' executable and the CSS file 'index.css' before the CI runs a sass command. It sets up a shim for sass invocation, falling back to copying precompiled CSS if necessary.

methods.name: main logic for ensuring sass shim
methods.description: Sets up a local sass shim if not present, which delegates to npx sass, node sass.js, or copies fallback CSS.
